rooms.description: Spacious minimalist living area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering abundant natural light, designed for comfort and casual gatherings. Vastu principles aligned to ensure a positive energy flow.
Modern, minimalist kitchen integrated into the living space with efficient workflow, featuring an island counter for social interaction, in accordance with local building norms.
Compact dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed as a transitional zone between culinary and social spaces.
Dedicated home office space optimized for focus and productivity with floor-to-ceiling windows enhancing natural lighting; placed in an auspicious direction per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window offering panoramic views, designed for ventilation and abundant natural light.
Seamless transition between kitchen and living area promoting connectivity within the space.

rooms.description: Primary bedroom designed as a bachelor pad for one, with minimalist design elements and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. Incorporates Vastu principles to ensure restful energy.
Second bedroom for guest use or additional family member, designed with simplicity in mind while maintaining privacy.
Cozy home theater space optimized for entertainment with soundproofing and ambient lighting, adhering to minimalist design principles.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window enhancing brightness and creating a serene atmosphere.
Connecting doorway allowing easy access between second bedroom and the home theater space.
